attributes.action: Outlaw mandatory Covid-19 vaccination for UK citizens
attributes.additional_details: Any invasive medical procedure can only be done with fully informed consent. This means being aware of both the alleged benefits and the risks posed. Additionally, any medical intervention must be entirely free of coercion (whether explicit or implicit) and thus coercion in any form must be specifically prohibited and legislated against. We cannot allow the State to dictate which medical interventions are mandated for us. Free and informed consent must always be the first priority.
attributes.background: Introduce a Bill to specifically prohibit mandatory vaccination in any UK setting. As sovereign beings we must retain full autonomy over our bodies in all circumstances.

rejection.details:
It is already against the law for people to be required to undergo medical treatment, including vaccinations.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Prohibit employers from requiring staff to be vaccinated against Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599841

Do not require Covid vaccination passports for crowded events: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592671

Do not require a Covid passport for access to any services, jobs or events: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593122

Outlaw discrimination on the basis of vaccination status: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596004

Stop discriminating against the unvaccinated in Covid 19 policy: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597239

Do not make COVID vaccination a requirement for health and social care workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600872
